content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place with a good value for money. I was thinking of offering 500 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euro per month is a very generous offer, Farhad. However, considering the prime location of the apartment and the recent construction, I believe we can reach a higher price point that reflects the quality of the property. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. However, I'm a student and I have to consider my budget. I'm willing to pay 550 Euro per month. I think it's a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 Euro per month is certainly more aligned with the value of the apartment, Farhad. It's a step in the right direction. Can we discuss the terms of the lease as well? I'm sure we can find a lease term that suits both of our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, Mister Schmidt. I'm planning to stay in München for a long time, so I'm looking for a long-term lease. What about 2 years?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: A two-year lease sounds perfect, Farhad. It provides stability and allows us to build a long-term relationship. Regarding the rent, I believe we can settle on 550 Euro per month if you're willing to make a small additional contribution to the deposit. How does that sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair to me, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 550 Euro per month with an additional contribution to the deposit.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Farhad. I agree to the price of 550 Euro per month with an additional contribution to the deposit. We will proceed with the lease agreement for two years. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
